page.title: 02St.Luke's C.E.Primary School
page.content: The Headmaster is called Mr R.G Park and Mrs E.M Scott is the Deputy Head. The school is a Church of England Primary School and it is linked to the churh.We have a jumble sale every year to raise money for our school funds. This year J4 organised a comic sale to help the people of the Mexican Earth quake disaster.We often have Discos for all of the children admission is 50p.Our playground is fairly big and there are two skittleball pitches. Our field is big,on it is a football pitch and a Rounders pitch.We wear school uniform which is maroon and silver grey.There are 7 classrooms in our school and each of them have room for approximately 30 children.There are two T.V.s in the school and also a computor and a video.Every year we have a cross country run and a school sports day.
